title: Sine Properties
text: Because sine is an odd function, $$sin(-x)=-sin(x)$$.

title: Rewrite sines with positive angles
text: What is the difference of sines when the angles are rewritten to all be positive?

title: Equivalent Arguments
text: Since the two sine functions have the same angle argument of $$3x$$, they can simply be added together with a multiplying coefficient of $$2$$.
